snippet: An offhand remark by former President George W. Bush indicated that he is paying attention to one of the most heated debates in Washington — the future of the tax cuts he championed.
abstract: An offhand remark by former President George W. Bush indicated that he is paying attention to one of the most heated debates in Washington — the future of the tax cuts he championed.

headline.main: Bush Weighs In on Tax Debate
headline.print_headline: Bush Makes a Cameo In the Tax-Cut Debate
